# Powerworks Garage Dubai

> British-owned car repair and service centre in Dubai's Al Quoz Industrial Area. Specialist in European, Japanese, and American vehicles with 25+ years experience.

## About

Powerworks Garage is owned and operated by Glenn Power, a British master technician with over 25 years of automotive experience. Founded in 2015, the garage brings UK workshop standards to Dubai â€” honest diagnostics, transparent pricing, and genuine parts.

- Location: Al Quoz Industrial Area 3, Dubai, UAE
- Phone: +971 52 121 7425
- Website: https://powerworksgarage.com
- Rating: 4.9/5 (150+ Google Reviews)
- Opening Hours: Mon-Thu & Sun 8AM-6PM, Fri 8AM-4PM
